basics.name: Kevin Liu
basics.label: Computer Engineering Student
basics.summary: Aloha! I am Kevin Liu, a third-year student studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2020.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Promote the College of Engineering and STEM to prospective students with outreach events
Visit local high schools to present about the College of Engineering to interested students
Host various professional development events such as Career Fairs and workshops
Utilize React.js framework to create data visualization on website dashboard
Implemented Javascript, HTML, and CSS to better user interface of website
Constructed Graph Generator page that allows for node selection and displays data as graphs
President, Circle K International at the University of Hawaii at Manoa, 2018-Present
Pledge, Eta Kappa Nu Delta Omega Chapter, 2018-Present
Vice President of Internal Affairs, Engineers' Council at the University of Hawaii, 2018-Present

awards.title: Manoa Merit Scholar
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.5 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.awarder: College of Engineering Holmes Hall Challenge
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2016.  See my portfolio site for more details.
